sentences.english: I reminded myself then and there that in the cold of the winter I would wish I had this heat.
sentences.chinese: 立即告訴站在嚴寒裏的自己，希望能擁有夏季的炎熱。

sentences.english: Tropical summers of 24hr sunlight are replaced by freezing winters of continuous night.
sentences.chinese: 到了冬季，夏季不斷的酷熱被連續的夜間嚴寒所代。

sentences.english: In this permanently cold environment, the ice cap from t.
sentences.chinese: 在這種持續嚴寒的條件下，冰帽從北極逐漸向南擴展。

sentences.english: And I want to thank all of you for braving the cold and the crowds and traveling in some cases thousands of miles to join us here today.
sentences.chinese: 我要感謝冒着嚴寒千里迢迢趕來的人們。

sentences.english: What could be better on a numbingly cold winter night than a hot pot to warm your heart?
sentences.chinese: 嚴寒冬日，有什麼能比火鍋更暖人心呢？

sentences.english: In a cold winter, wild animals may die from lack of food.
sentences.chinese: 在嚴寒的冬天，野生動物會由於缺乏食物而死亡。

sentences.english: The naked branches seemed to shiver with horror of the cold.
sentences.chinese: 光禿禿的枝條抖動着，彷彿它們也懼怕嚴寒。

sentences.english: Out of the inner parts shall a tempest come, and cold out of the north.
sentences.chinese: 暴風來自南極密宮，嚴寒出自極北之地。

sentences.english: The Master said, "Only when the year turns freezing cold do we realize that pines and cypresses are the last to wither."
sentences.chinese: 孔子說，“歲月遇嚴寒，才知道松柏是最後凋謝的。”

sentences.english: I stood there awhile and tried not to let the cold get to me.
sentences.chinese: 我在那站了一會，試圖抵擋嚴寒的侵襲。

sentences.english: It was a cold winter day in 1919.
sentences.chinese: 那是1919年的一個嚴寒的冬天。

sentences.english: Hair insulates animals against the sun by day as well as against the cold by night.
sentences.chinese: 毛髮使得動物可以在白天抵擋陽光，在夜晚抵擋嚴寒。

sentences.english: Freezing weather conditions and heavy snow are continuing to cause disruptions across the country. Getty Images / Dan Kitwood
sentences.chinese: 嚴寒的天氣和大雪對整個國家繼續着破壞。

sentences.english: The main pipe burst in the severe cold , and the gas has been getting out.
sentences.chinese: 主管道在嚴寒中凍裂了，煤氣泄漏了出來。

sentences.english: In the cold regions, both heat preservation and thermal insulation compound walls can be assembled.
sentences.chinese: 在寒冷和嚴寒地區，可組合成及保溫有隔熱的複合牆。

sentences.english: Half the fruit crop was frozen out in the sudden severe autumn.
sentences.chinese: 有一半的果樹在這突如其來的嚴寒的秋季凍死了。
